import React, { useState } from "react"; import Header from "./Header"; import NotFound from "./NotFound"; import { Switch, Route } from "react-router-dom"; import Main from "./Main.js" import NewDeck from "./NewDeck.js" import Deck from "./Deck.js" import NewCard from "./NewCard" import Study from "./Study" function Layout() { const [decks, setDecks] = useState([]); function updateDecks (data) { setDecks(data) } return ( <>
) } export default Layout;
